programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: Race to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: An ex-convict cab driver becomes the protector of two aliens disguised as children who claim to hold the key to Earth's continued existence. As he races against time to return the visitors to their spaceship, he must also hold off hostile government agents and a sinister extraterrestrial assassin. Sci-fi adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, AnnaSophia Robb, Alexander Ludwig and Carla Gugino.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.

programme.title: Kermit's Swamp Years
programme.desc: The fast-talking frog sets out in pursuit of a kidnapper who has abducted his friend. Leaving the safety of his marshland home, he follows a trail that leads him to the bright lights of Hollywood - but he also has to contend with an evil scientist along the way. Muppet comedy adventure, with Christian Kebbel and the voices of Steve Whitmire, Dave Goelz and Bill Baretta.

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.

programme.title: Dr Dolittle 2
programme.desc: The vet with a talent for talking to animals comes to the aid of forest creatures that need his help protecting their homes from land developers. He also has to deal with the love life of a circus bear that has fallen for a wild female. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy and Kevin Pollak, with the voices of Steve Zahn, Lisa Kudrow and Isaac Hayes.

programme.title: Ghosthunters: On Icy Trails
programme.desc: A fearful young boy forms an unlikely bond with a loveable green ghost and tries to help him reclaim his haunted house. Family adventure, starring Anke Engelke, Milo Parker and the voice of Bastian Pastewka.

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher.

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.

programme.title: Ghosthunters: On Icy Trails
programme.desc: A fearful young boy forms an unlikely bond with a loveable green ghost and tries to help him reclaim his haunted house. Family adventure, starring Anke Engelke, Milo Parker and the voice of Bastian Pastewka.

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: Coraline

Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher.

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.

programme.title: Dr Dolittle 2
programme.desc: The vet with a talent for talking to animals comes to the aid of forest creatures that need his help protecting their homes from land developers. He also has to deal with the love life of a circus bear that has fallen for a wild female. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy and Kevin Pollak, with the voices of Steve Zahn, Lisa Kudrow and Isaac Hayes.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.

programme.title: Problem Child
programme.desc: When a couple seek to adopt a child from an orphanage, the administrator sees the chance to rid himself of the bane of his existence - an uncontrollable youngster who causes chaos and destruction wherever he goes. Comedy, starring John Ritter, Amy Yasbeck, Jack Warden, Peter Jurasik and Michael Oliver.

programme.title: Dr Dolittle 3
programme.desc: The talented vet's daughter with the same uncanny ability to talk to animals is staying at a ranch. When she learns financial problems will force the place to close, she comes up with an ingenious idea to solve the crisis by training the livestock for a rodeo and winning $50,000. Comedy sequel, starring Kyla Pratt, Kristen Wilson and John Amos.

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town singer creates a bold alternate identity for herself, and records a music video. The song becomes an internet sensation and she soon finds her alter ego becoming a huge star - but risks losing touch with the things that matter the most to her. Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara.

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leader's plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Children's fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: A bumbling, short-sighted senior citizen unwittingly ends up in the possession of a valuable jewel during a mix-up at a museum exhibition, and is blissfully unaware that a Brazilian crime lord, a female cat burglar and the FBI are on his tail. Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring Leslie Nielsen, Kelly Lynch, Malcolm McDowell, Ernie Hudson and Jennifer Garner.(n)

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leader's plan to turn all the children in England into mice. Children's fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.title: Big Hero 6 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits Disney studios to go behind the scenes of the animated adventure about a boy and his robot who join a team of superheroes.(n)

programme.title: Minions: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: A special look at the hotly anticipated Despicable Me spin-off, featuring the voices of Sandra Bullock and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez.(n)

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: A 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical land, having forgotten her previous adventures. She finds the tyrannical Red Queen has begun a reign of terror that can only be ended by slaying the monstrous Jabberwocky - a task she is seemingly destined to attempt. Tim Burton's fantasy adventure based on Lewis Carroll's novels, starring Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Son of the Mask
programme.desc: The life of an unassuming cartoonist is turned upside down by a mysterious wooden mask, which endows his baby son with fantastic eye-popping powers. However, the chaos escalates when mischievous Norse god Loki decides he wants the mask back - no matter what the cost. Comedy sequel, starring Jamie Kennedy, Alan Cumming, Bob Hoskins and Traylor Howard.(n)

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody.

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: A gangster in 1970s Boston agrees to collaborate with an FBI agent in the hope of eliminating their common enemy - the Italian Mafia. However, the arrangement soon spirals out of control as the mobster uses his insider knowledge to outwit the law and consolidate his own power. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Johnny Depp, Benedict Cumberbatch, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
programme.desc: Two brothers living in New York's Chinatown in the 1980s rise quickly through the ranks of a local gang. When their organisation clashes with a rival, the siblings are targeted by a hard-bitten cop who is determined to clean up the streets. Crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Justin Chon and Kevin Wu.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman.

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: A veteran jewel thief seems to have it all, enjoying a relaxing retirement in a Caribbean paradise - but the lure of one last heist looks set to be his downfall as an old enemy plots to finally collar the crook. Comedy thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson, Don Cheadle and Naomie Harris.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Will the youngster prove to be a chip off the old block by proving useful during a battle against a twisted, hi-tech genius? Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.

Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.(n)

programme.title: Dark Places
programme.desc: A seven-year-old girl witnesses the murder of her mother and sisters, and testifies that her teenage brother was the killer, leading to his imprisonment. As an adult, she attends a gathering of true-crime fans, and discovers they all think her brother was innocent. She reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime, and begins to realise her memories may not be as reliable as she thought. Mystery, starring Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.(n)

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.(n)

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.(n)

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: A successful author finds his relief at being rescued from a near-fatal car crash is severely tempered by the discovery that his saviour is a fan with psychopathic tendencies. The situation takes a turn for the worse when she discovers he has killed off her favourite character - and sets about coercing him to do a rewrite in nightmarish fashion. Oscar-winning thriller, starring James Caan, Kathy Bates and Lauren Bacall.

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: The elderly residents of a retirement home treat themselves to an occasional dip in the pool at an abandoned house. It turns out that friendly aliens in human form are using the place to restore dormant members of their species - and energy from their cocoons is giving the old-timers a new lease of life. Ron Howard's sci-fi drama, with Wilford Brimley, Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Don Ameche and Steve Guttenberg.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Three sleep-deprived people gather at a house haunted by evil spirits to take part in an insomnia study. It soon becomes clear they are really there to aid a scientist's investigation into the origins of fear - and from the very first night, the visitors find themselves facing their deepest and most secret terrors as they confront the unknown forces prowling the corridors. Horror remake, starring Liam Neeson, Lili Taylor, Catherine Zeta-Jones and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Minutes before boarding a rollercoaster with her friends, a high-school graduate has a premonition they will all die and persuades them to get off the ride - just before it crashes. However, death seems intent on catching up with them, as one by one they meet a gruesome end. Horror sequel, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson and Sam Easton.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Three sleep-deprived people gather at a house haunted by evil spirits to take part in an insomnia study. It soon becomes clear they are really there to aid a scientist's investigation into the origins of fear - and from the very first night, the visitors find themselves facing their deepest and most secret terrors as they confront the unknown forces prowling the corridors. Horror remake, starring Liam Neeson, Lili Taylor, Catherine Zeta-Jones and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Minutes before boarding a rollercoaster with her friends, a high-school graduate has a premonition they will all die and persuades them to get off the ride - just before it crashes. However, death seems intent on catching up with them, as one by one they meet a gruesome end. Horror sequel, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson and Sam Easton.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part IV: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Hockey-masked serial killer Jason is resurrected again, and sets his sights on a fresh batch of unlucky teenagers in Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Kimberly Beck, Crispin Glover, Ted White and Corey Feldman.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
programme.desc: Mass-murderer Jason Voorhees' corpse is re-animated yet again, this time by a bolt of lightning, and rises from the grave to embark on another blood-drenched killing spree. Horror, starring Thom Mathews, Jennifer Cooke and CJ Graham.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
programme.desc: A telepathic woman accidentally sets supernatural serial killer Jason free to kill again, and soon realises she must use her psychic powers to defeat the monster and save herself from a grisly fate. Horror sequel, with Lar Park Lincoln, Kevin Spirtas and Kane Hodder.

programme.title: Cocoon: The Return
programme.desc: Three elderly couples return to Earth five years after leaving to retire on a distant planet, surprising their families, who assumed they were dead. Several of their alien friends have come back with them to recover members of their own race left behind in cocoons on the ocean floor, one of whom has been abducted by a government research institute. Sci-fi sequel, with Wilford Brimley, Don Ameche, Steve Guttenberg and Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film.(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Hour
programme.desc: In a not-too-distant future, a ruthless alien invasion reduces Earth's few remaining humans to scavengers, ready to prey on their own kind as a means to survive. In a remote corner of the British countryside, feisty teenager Sarah makes a desperate attempt to protect her blind younger sister and defend her family's farm from a group of vicious bandits, all while avoiding an untimely demise at the hands of the from the extra-terrestrial threat. Sci-fi thriller, starring Dakota Blue Richards.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: A cop embarks on his first day in narcotics, partnering a seasoned officer whose willingness to flout the rules forces him to question everything he has learnt. As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger.

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.

programme.title: The Crow's Egg
programme.desc: Comedy-drama following a pair of poverty stricken Indian brothers determined to earn the money to eat at a new pizza parlour. Starring Vignesh, Ramesh and Iyshwarya Rajesh.

programme.title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A faded movie star famous for his role in a series of superhero movies 20 years previously tries to reclaim his artisitic integrity by directing and starring in a Broadway play. The experience plunges him into a personal crisis as both the production and his own family are beset by a series of disasters. Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Keaton, Edward Norton and Emma Stone.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A youngster growing up in a town inhabited only by boys and women makes a strange discovery in the ocean that leaves him convinced that secrets are being kept from him. When he is taken to hospital for a series of procedures, he discovers the terrible truth about his home. Sci-fi mystery, starring Max Brebant and Roxane Duran. In French.

programme.title: Fiddler on the Roof
programme.desc: A poor Jewish milkman is set on finding good husbands for his three eldest daughters while coming to terms with the pressures of village life in Ukraine under Tsarist rule. Unfortunately, his well-meaning plan is hampered by the girls' obstinate insistence on making their own marital choices. Norman Jewison's musical, starring Topol, Norma Crane, Paul Michael Glaser and Leonard Frey.

programme.title: Ma Ma
programme.desc: A single mum finds meaning in new friendships as her treatment for breast cancer intensifies. Spanish drama, starring Penelope Cruz.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket
programme.desc: Raw recruits undergo harsh training under a domineering Marine drill sergeant after being called up for service in the Vietnam War, but his brutal methods lead to the breakdown of one of his cadets. Eventually, some of the fully trained soldiers get their first taste of combat in 1968. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio and R Lee Ermey.

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: A boy develops strange powers that he cannot understand, attracting the attention of religious extremists. The boy's father is determined to keep him safe, and together they go on the run from the fanatics in the hope of finding out the true purpose of his abilities - but they attract the attention of government agents, who have their own plans for the child. Sci-fi adventure, starring Michael Shannon, Jaeden Lieberher and Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson.

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A hitman takes the chance to combine his latest assassination job with a trip back to his home town for a school reunion. The occasion starts to get complicated when an old flame turns up and rekindles their lost romance - while a rival killer harasses him to join an assassins' union. Black comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: The Crow's Egg
programme.desc: Comedy-drama following a pair of poverty stricken Indian brothers determined to earn the money to eat at a new pizza parlour. Starring Vignesh, Ramesh and Iyshwarya Rajesh.

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin.

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Small-time crook Tony Montana emigrates from Cuba to the US, determined to become rich and powerful. Admitted into the inner circle of a Miami drug lord, he ultimately takes over his boss's empire and even his wife. However, his paranoia and cocaine addiction begin to spiral out of control, while his enemies circle, waiting for the chance to bring him down. Gangster thriller remake, with Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer and Robert Loggia.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.(n)

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two maverick cops set out to topple a drugs baron who has transformed an apartment block into a seemingly impregnable fortress, but reckon without the villain's determination to stay out of jail - leading to explosive confrontations. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson, Chris Rock and Allen Payne.(n)

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton.(n)

programme.title: Cub
programme.desc: A young boy goes on a camping trip with his fellow Cub Scouts, and crosses paths with a bloodthirsty poacher. Belgian horror, starring Maurice Luijten, Evelien Bosmans and Titus De Voogdt. In Flemish, French and Dutch.(n)

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.(n)

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck boxing coach nurses a grudge because his best fighter has abandoned him for the big time. When a 31-year-old waitress turns up asking him to train her, he refuses outright. However, her persistence wins him round and the pair go on to form a strong professional partnership and successful career. Oscar-winning drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Hilary Swank, Morgan Freeman and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang.(n)

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: A gambler takes over the running of a Las Vegas casino in the 1970s. His success is threatened by the arrival of an unstable old friend, now a powerful and ambitious mobster, an investigation by the FBI and his own wife's tortured past. Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Joe Pesci, Sharon Stone and James Woods.(n)

programme.title: Vinyan
programme.desc: A married couple travel to the remote jungles of Burma to search for their child who went missing following the 2004 tsunami. As they enter the forbidden area, known only to Thailand's criminal underclass, they discover a terrifying and dangerous world where men communicate with spirits of the dead. Horror, starring Emmanuelle Beart, Rufus Sewell, Julie Dreyfus and Petch Osathanugrah.

programme.title: Magnificent Obsession
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy blames himself for the death of the doctor who saved his own life in a boating accident, and when he later falls in love with the medic's widow and a second accident causes her to go blind, he trains as a surgeon in the hope of restoring her sight. Melodrama, starring Rock Hudson, Jane Wyman, Agnes Moorehead and Otto Kruger.

programme.title: Twelve O'Clock High
programme.desc: A US Air Force officer takes command of a bomber squadron based in England, and has to suppress his humane instincts to restore morale and discipline - a task which places a heavy strain on his mental state and brings his weary men to the edge of endurance. Oscar-winning Second World War drama, with Gregory Peck, Hugh Marlowe, Gary Merrill and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A wildlife photographer is forced to master his fears and the elements as he leads an expedition to climb K2, the world's second highest mountain, on a desperate mission to rescue his estranged sister and her fellow mountaineers, who have fallen into a crevasse. Action adventure, starring Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton, Scott Glenn and Robin Tunney.

programme.title: Split Interview Special
programme.desc: Director M Night Shyamalan and star James McAvoy talk about the psychological and storytelling complexities of their creepy collaboration Split.

programme.title: The Last Days on Mars
programme.desc: A party of astronauts on a mission to Mars discovers evidence that the red planet once sustained life, but soon after one of their number is killed. As further deaths occur, the explorers realise the organisms they have found may still be alive and could kill them all. Sci-fi horror, starring Liev Schreiber, Elias Koteas and Romola Garai.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A failed writer acquires a supply of an experimental drug that enables his brain to process and learn information at a superhuman rate. His new-found abilities allow him to make a killing on the stock market, but he soon attracts the attention of shadowy forces who have sinister plans for him. Sci-fi thriller, with Bradley Cooper, Robert De Niro and Abbie Cornish.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: A lonely would-be stand-up comic is desperate to become a celebrity, an ambition that has left him with a tenuous grip on reality. After a fleeting encounter with his chat-show host hero, he imagines they have become friends. However, when the presenter refuses to endorse his career, the comic resorts to kidnapping him and hijacking the show. Martin Scorsese's black comedy, starring Robert De Niro and Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: A knight returning home from fighting in the Wars of the Roses returns home to discover his father has been murdered. A family friend fighting for the other side has been blamed for the crime, but the knight tries to prove his wicked uncle is responsible. Swashbuckling adventure based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Louis Hayward and Janet Blair.

programme.title: Split Interview Special
programme.desc: Director M Night Shyamalan and star James McAvoy talk about the psychological and storytelling complexities of their creepy collaboration Split.

programme.title: Prometheus Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott and actors Charlize Theron, Michael Fassbender and Noomi Rapace discuss the making of the sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: The Jane Austen Book Club
programme.desc: Two women organise a book club devoted to reading and discussing Jane Austen novels. But the members - including a woman abandoned by her husband and a reluctant lovesick sci-fi fan - discover their own love lives are beginning to mirror the plots of her books in unexpected ways. Romantic comedy, starring Kathy Baker, Maria Bello, Emily Blunt, Amy Brenneman, Maggie Grace and Hugh Dancy.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A Chinese secret agent falls in love with a single mother while helping the CIA apprehend a terrorist, and decides to quit the espionage business. He offers to look after her three kids for the weekend, but struggles to cope with their mischief-making - and to make matters worse, the terrorist escapes from prison. Comedy, with Jackie Chan and Magnus Scheving.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: A peasant boy, who has a special bond with animals and fairies, shows his sweetheart the last surviving unicorns. Unfortunately, a monstrous demon and his goblin henchmen despise the mythical creatures and trick the girl into harming one of them, forcing Jack to act quickly to save her immortal soul. Ridley Scott's fantasy adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Mia Sara, Tim Curry and David Bennent.

programme.title: Split Interview Special
programme.desc: Director M Night Shyamalan and star James McAvoy talk about the psychological and storytelling complexities of their creepy collaboration Split.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: A gangster testifies against his partners in crime, before he and his family are relocated to rural France under the witness protection program. Despite their FBI handler's efforts to keep them under control, they soon return to their criminal ways - while the mobsters they betrayed are soon on their trail. Comedy thriller, with Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer and Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: Blue Ruin
programme.desc: Homeless drifter Dwight hears that the man who murdered his parents has been released from jail and decides to track down and kill him, but ends up being hunted himself by the killer's family. Thriller, starring Macon Blair, Devin Ratray and Eve Plumb.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: A violent and sadistic bully makes life a misery for other teenagers, pushes around his so-called best friend and rapes a local girl. Eventually, his victims all band together to have him killed, hiring an incompetent hitman to do the job. But things do not go entirely as they planned. Fact-based drama from Kids director Larry Clark. Starring Brad Renfro, Rachel Miner, Bijou Phillips and Nick Stahl.(n)

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill.(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: The working day for two mismatched single professionals is thrown into turmoil when their children have to stay at home after missing a school trip. The pair agree to take it in turns to babysit while struggling to stick to their hectic schedules - but during the course of the day their feelings for each other blossom unexpectedly. Romantic comedy, starring George Clooney, Michelle Pfeiffer, Charles Durning and Mae Whitman.(n)

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: Legendary outlaw hero Robin Hood rallies his merry men to thwart a dastardly plan by the Sheriff of Nottingham to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury, who has denounced the sheriff's plot to confiscate another nobleman's land. Medieval adventure, starring Richard Greene, Peter Cushing, Niall MacGinnis, Richard Pasco, Sarah Branch and Oliver Reed.(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: A boy mysteriously disappears in 1978, and is found eight years later, having not aged a day. He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: A spacecraft is sent to another world, following clues left in ancient artefacts, in search of aliens that may have created the human race. However, the explorers on board discover the extraterrestrials may not be the benevolent creatures they imagined, while the company funding the expedition has its own agenda. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller and Alien prequel, starring Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Awakening
programme.desc: Vampire warrior Selene returns to life after spending years in cryonic suspension by a scientist. Escaping from the facility where she is being held, she finds humans have discovered the existence of the undead and are planning to wipe them out, a new breed of mutant werewolves has emerged, and her super-powered daughter holds the key to ending the conflict. Action fantasy, with Kate Beckinsale, India Eisley and Stephen Rea.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Problems arise during John-Boy's first day at Boatwright College.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy challenges a rich young man in the traditional cross-country race that was won many years earlier by Grandpa Walton.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Adam and Mary take a trip to the city to collect an award he has won, but their journey proves eventful for all the wrong reasons when their coach overturns. Mary must deliver the baby of a pregnant fellow passenger, while Adam remains trapped under the wreckage. Drama, starring Melissa Sue Anderson.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels becomes apprehensive when he learns that a travelling circus, in which his estranged sister Annabelle is one of the stars, is coming to Walnut Grove. Drama, starring Richard Bull.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Meredith Baxter stars in this adaptation of Louisa May Alcott's classic tale, which chronicles the rites of passage facing four sisters, living in pre-Civil War New England. With William Shatner, Susan Dey and Eve Plumb.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's book is accepted for publishing, ensuring his feelings of inadequacy are completely erased, and upstaging his brother Jason in the process.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Journey in the Spring - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles brings his newly widowed father to Walnut Grove where he clashes with Laura over seeing his grandchildren.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles.

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A minister comes to stay with the Waltons, but his presence soon sparks off all manner of religious ructions.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura befriends a girl with a deformed leg, but when Charles offers to help the youngster walk more easily, her father objects.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: After emerging from a bitter divorce battle, single mother Joanna returns to the sleepy home town she could not wait to flee as a teenager. As she sets about rekindling old friendships, Joanna finds herself falling in love with an old flame. However, the man is married, and the pair's affair threatens to rock the community. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams and Kristen Holden-Ried.

programme.title: An Unfinished Affair
programme.desc: An art professor embarks on an affair with one of his students, but later abandons her. Unfortunately, she does not take kindly to being rejected, and gets revenge by seducing his son. Drama, with Jennie Garth, Tim Matheson and Leigh Taylor-Young.

programme.title: Ann Rule's The Stranger Beside Me
programme.desc: An aspiring crime reporter is hired to investigate a series of grisly, unsolved murders stretching from Utah to Seattle, only to discover the killer is one of her closest friends. Fact-based thriller, starring Bill Campbell, Barbara Hershey, Kevin Dunn and Suki Kaiser.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A body is discovered in the burned-out basement of a Glasgow factory and a straightforward case of arson suddenly turns into a murder inquiry, giving Burke the chance to put his squad of fledgling detectives to the test. Crime drama, starring Alex Norton, Blythe Duff and John Michie.

programme.title: For the Love of a Child
programme.desc: Two inspirational women who carry out extensive work with abused, neglected and abandoned children around the world. Drama, starring Peri Gilpin, Teri Polo and Maria Del Mar.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob gets frustrated when nobody pays attention to his personal feelings, and runs away from home.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia takes a night-school art class and receives other attentions from the instructor.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson is shocked to discover a woman has spent the night in the Rev Alden's room and wastes no time in setting out to have him expelled from the Church.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert dreams he and his sister have been captured by Native Americans who have mistaken him for the son of a famous chief. Drama, starring Matthew Laborteaux.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Part two of two. Drama based on Louisa May Alcott's novel about four sisters growing up together in New England during the American Civil War. Starring Meredith Baxter, Susan Dey and Eve Plumb.

programme.desc: John-Boy's new part-time job hurtles him into the throes of an emotional battle raging in the heart of a hostile young blind woman.

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The War Bride
programme.desc: A cockney seamstress marries a Canadian serviceman after a whirlwind romance in London during the Second World War. She is sent to live with his family on their farm in a backwater of Alberta until the conflict is over, but she struggles to get along with her dour in-laws, who make no attempt to welcome her. Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: After emerging from a bitter divorce battle, single mother Joanna returns to the sleepy home town she could not wait to flee as a teenager. As she sets about rekindling old friendships, Joanna finds herself falling in love with an old flame. However, the man is married, and the pair's affair threatens to rock the community. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams and Kristen Holden-Ried.

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder.

programme.title: Freefall: Flight 174
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a passenger plane which runs out of fuel during a routine flight over the wilds of Canada, forcing the crew to prepare for a dangerous emergency landing in Winnipeg. Starring William Devane, Scott Hylands and Nicholas Turturro.

programme.desc: Charlie and Laura go to the aid of their old friend Mr Edwards, who is suffering from depression.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A pair of conniving con artists set out to swindle the residents of Walnut Grove by persuading Jonathan Garvey he is a sure bet to win a wrestling championship. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arc
programme.desc: The first of a two-part drama. A young French girl experiences religious visions, convincing her she has been sent by God to unite her countrymen under the rule of King Charles. Historical drama, starring Leelee Sobieski, Jacqueline Bissett, Powers Boothe, Olympia Dukakis, Shirley MacLaine and Peter O'Toole.(n)

programme.desc: An old friend of the family turns up on Walton's Mountain, but it soon transpires that he has an ulterior motive for paying them a visit.(n)

programme.desc: As Thanksgiving approaches, Elizabeth resolves to gather the entire Walton family together again for an old-fashioned celebration - but struggles to persuade everyone to attend. Drama, starring Kami Cotler, Ralph Waite, Jon Walmsley and Ellen Corby.(n)

programme.title: Liz & Dick
programme.desc: Fact-based drama telling the story of the relationship between Hollywood icons Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton. The stars meet on the set of historical epic Cleopatra while both married to other people, and begin a passionate and very public affair. Over the next 25 years, they would marry and divorce each other twice, constantly under the scrutiny of the media. Starring Lindsay Lohan, Grant Bowler and Theresa Russell.(n)

programme.title: Ring of Fire
programme.desc: The story of the decades-long love affair between June Carter and her husband, Johnny Cash. Romantic drama, starring Jewel Kilcher, Matt Ross and John Doe.(n)

programme.title: The Last Don
programme.desc: Three-part crime drama focusing on America's most powerful Mafia family, based on the novel by Godfather author Mario Puzo. Danny Aiello stars as patriarch Domenico Clericuzo, whose world falls apart when his son is murdered by rivals - the same gang whose leading protagonist is about to marry his daughter. Kirstie Alley, Daryl Hannah and Joe Mantegna also star, with an appearance by singer kd lang.(n)

programme.title: The Last Don
programme.desc: Part two. Ten years after the murder of his favourite son, Don Clericuzio faces further family turmoil as Cross draws closer to the heart of the family while cousin Dante's increasingly psychopathic behaviour proves a major liability. Underworld drama based on the novel by Godfather author Mario Puzo, starring Danny Aiello, Jason Gedrick and Rory Cochrane.(n)

programme.title: No Ordinary Baby
programme.desc: A couple investigate the possibility of cloning their daughter after she is killed in an accident. Drama, starring Bridget Fonda, Mary Beth Hurt, Philip Bosco and Adam LeFevre.

programme.title: The Affair: 307
programme.desc: Helen gives Noah the help he needs - but at what cost? At his absolute weakest, Noah's world has never seemed more hostile or bewildering. A vital moment of release turns suddenly into something that can't be undone

programme.title: #Pushing Boundaries
programme.desc: Sunny introduces us to a transgender woman who has recently undergone sex reassignment surgery - and has her first sexual encounter with a man. A panel of Sunny's friends and experts talk about trans acceptance and pushing boundaries. Plus, a man describes how it feels to have large insects crawling on his naked body; a curious couple finds out from an expert how the future in their bedroom is 'behind' them. And are large breasts less sensitive than small breasts? Sunny brings in a bevy of beauties and tests them
