programme.title: #BDSM
programme.desc: Sunny explains the acronym BDSM and meets a couple who'd like to go a little further and try something called suspension wrap. A panel of experts and friends talk with Sunny about introducing elements of BDSM into vanilla sex. programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan stars as a college student who returns home after his father has a stroke and discovers a severed ear in an abandoned field. When he attempts to find out what has happened, he is drawn into a dark, depraved and mysterious world. David Lynch directs. Co-stars Isabella Rossellini, Dennis Hopper and Laura Dern

programme.title: Detoxing
programme.desc: In episode 504, an interview with a parasitologist who spills the truth about the parasites that live inside us and a visit to a life-size walkthrough colon round out a skeptical inquiry into the allegedly cleansing process of detoxifying(c)

programme.title: Drug War
programme.desc: A Chinese-Hong Kong crime thriller about a police captain who teams up with a drug manufacturer to go undercover so that he can bust a notorious drug lord but finds himself drawn into a dangerous battle of wits

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Finsters and the Pickles travel to the City of Lights, where Chucky hopes that his dad Chas will find him a new mother while he repairs the malfunctioning reptiles at a European dinosaur theme park. Based on the beloved Nickelodeon series, this animated family adventure features the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Susan Sarandon, Michael Bell, Cheryl Chase, John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, Mako, Casey Kasem and Tim Curry

programme.title: Bobby
programme.desc: On June 5, 1968 the lives of nearly two-dozen people are changed irrevocably by the sudden assassination of Robert Kennedy at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. An ensemble cast recreates the momentous day in this drama written and directed by Emilio Estevez, with Anthony Hopkins, Harry Belafonte, Sharon Stone, William H. Macy, Shia LaBeouf, Lindsay Lohan, Helen Hunt, Laurence Fishburne, Joshua Jackson, Heather Graham and Nick Cannon

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: Arctic Tale

Jacinda Barrett, Michael Clarke Duncan, Sarah Silverman, Matt Walsh, Luis Guzman, David Cross, Horatio Sanz and Todd Louiso costar(n)

programme.title: High School
programme.desc: The day after valedictorian Henry Burke (Matt Bush) tries marijuana for the first time, his school principal (Michael Chiklis) institutes mandatory drug tests for all students. Henry has two options: fail and lose his college scholarship, or team up with his stoner friend Travis (Sean Marquette) to beat the system. After all, if everyone fails the drug test, then no one will be expelled, right? Adrien Brody co-stars in this pot comedy(n)

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage(n)

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack(n)

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award� winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears(n)

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award� nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: The Nasty Show Volume II Hosted by Brad Williams

programme.title: American Wedding
programme.desc: Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan star in this sequel to the classic American Pie comedies - as a couple of high-school sweethearts who need to get married in a hurry, before the groom's grandmother kicks the bucket. Also stars January Jones and Eugene Levy

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Shadow Zone: The Undead Express
programme.desc: A teenager (Chauncey Leopardi) given to supernatural confabulation encounters a sect of vampires living in the subway tunnels of New York, but nobody believes his wild story until one of his friends is kidnapped by the bloodsuckers. Ron Silver and Natanya Ross costar in this young adult horror fantasy

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women''s group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters

programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. The film was nominated for 12 Oscars, including Best Picture, Director (Jean Negulesco) and Actor (Lew Ayres), but Wyman's was the only win

programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku

programme.title: Po prostu po włosku
programme.desc: Prowadząca program Walijka Michela Chiappa udaje się do Włoch, skąd pochodzi jej rodzina, by dowiedzieć się wszystkiego na temat makaronów wszelkich kształtów i rozmiarów. Przekona widzów, że ze świeżego makaronu można przyrządzać naprawdę przepyszne i - co najważniejsze - nieskomplikowane dania. Pokaże im, jak dzięki temu produktowi zmienić nawet najprostszy posiłek we wspaniałą włoską ucztę. Michela pokazuje, jak robić różne pyszne włoskie kluski i kluseczki, m.in. gnocchi, torta, makaron naleśnikowy i tagliatelle

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie znawczynie mody Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine przybliżają Norweżkom zasady dobrego stylu i pokazują im, jak dobrze wyglądać. Odmieniają zaniedbane mieszkanki tego kraju w damy

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Jane pomaga walczyć o sprawiedliwy wyrok matce, której syn zmarł nagle na obozie sportowym. Owen i Kim zaczynają przesadnie interesować się relacjami Jane i Iana

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Ku zaskoczeniu Jane wychodzi na jaw, że Teri i Iana łączy wspólna przeszłość. Stacy coraz bardziej denerwuje się przed weselem. Boi się, że jej najlepsza przyjaciółka może nie dotrzeć na ceremonię

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiadają na miejscu kierowcy. Instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para ma trzy dni na poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Prezentacja prawdziwych, najczęściej wykonywanych w Polsce, zabiegów chirurgicznych. Tu nie ma miejsca na scenariusz. Przez kilka miesięcy kamera towarzyszy lekarzom oraz pacjentom jednego z największych szpitali publicznych. Rejestruje chwile od momentu diagnozy poprzez przygotowania do operacji, sam zabieg aż do efektu leczenia. W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. 65-letnia Teresa poznaje diagnozę - w jej piersi rośnie guz. 30- letnia Katarzyna przed dekadą przeżyła szok, gdy ginekolog powiedział jej o zmianie, jaką wyczuł w piersi. Lęk przed rakiem powraca

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Zbliża się rocznica ślubu rodziców Gretchen. Haase ma mało czasu, by znaleźć partnera na tę uroczystość. Przyjaciółka umawia ją na randkę w ciemno, ale kandydat okazuje się mało interesujący(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Gretchen bierze udział w testach tabletek na odchudzanie. Prowadzący badania doktor ignoruje poważne efekty uboczne, które wywołuje specyfik. W efekcie Gretchen musi ratować siebie i 20 innych osób(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna: waga ciężka
programme.desc: Karolina została przyjęta do szpitala warunkowo, bo znowu przytyła. Coraz bardziej dokucza jej ból kręgosłupa. Prof. Paśnik kwalifikuje ją do operacji. Z kolei 40-letni Artur jest bohaterem pierwszej edycji "Sali operacyjnej", kiedy to jego waga wynosiła 150 kg. Po zabiegu schudł 55 kg i nadal trzyma formę. Artur stara się wykorzystać swoją wiedzę i doświadczenie, by pomagać innym. Przyjechał do szpitala na konsultację z dietetykiem, bo pomimo starań przestał chudnąć. Dodatkowym problemem jest wisząca skóra - pamiątka po utraconych kilogramach. Tymczasem Ela zdecydowała się wreszcie iść na zakupy po nowe ubrania(n)

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Widzowie dowiedzą się, jak dobrze wypaść na pierwszej randce, jakich błędów nie popełniać, gdzie się umówić. Rad udzielą m.in. Jarosław Jakimowicz, Zygmunt Chajzer, Małgorzata Kosik czy Tomasz Niecik(n)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Joanna od zawsze była najlepsza we wszystkim. Nie do końca potrafi się przez to odnaleźć w pracy. Ma problemy z wypowiadaniem swojego zdania. Boi się, że to, co powie albo zrobi, nie będzie idealne(n)

W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. 65-letnia Teresa poznaje diagnozę - w jej piersi rośnie guz. 30- letnia Katarzyna przed dekadą przeżyła szok, gdy ginekolog powiedział jej o zmianie, jaką wyczuł w piersi. Lęk przed rakiem powraca

programme.desc: Zbliża się rocznica ślubu rodziców Gretchen. Haase ma mało czasu, by znaleźć partnera na tę uroczystość. Przyjaciółka umawia ją na randkę w ciemno, ale kandydat okazuje się mało interesujący(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Gretchen bierze udział w testach tabletek na odchudzanie. Prowadzący badania doktor ignoruje poważne efekty uboczne, które wywołuje specyfik. W efekcie Gretchen musi ratować siebie i 20 innych osób(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna: waga ciężka
programme.desc: Karolina została przyjęta do szpitala warunkowo, bo znowu przytyła. Coraz bardziej dokucza jej ból kręgosłupa. Prof. Paśnik kwalifikuje ją do operacji. Z kolei 40-letni Artur jest bohaterem pierwszej edycji "Sali operacyjnej", kiedy to jego waga wynosiła 150 kg. Po zabiegu schudł 55 kg i nadal trzyma formę. Artur stara się wykorzystać swoją wiedzę i doświadczenie, by pomagać innym. Przyjechał do szpitala na konsultację z dietetykiem, bo pomimo starań przestał chudnąć. Dodatkowym problemem jest wisząca skóra - pamiątka po utraconych kilogramach. Tymczasem Ela zdecydowała się wreszcie iść na zakupy po nowe ubrania(n)

programme.title: Taka sytuacja

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy and Howard use Ninja-ing to help with wonk laser tag. Then, stuck in a dream-within-a-dream-within-a-dream, Randy hopes to escape the loop.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: When the tiniest Watchdog cadet, Westley, is accidentally left behind on a planet, Wander and Sylvia befriend him, pretending to be his prisoners to help him reunite with Hater.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When a big-time Hollywood publicist discovers Spencer and vows to make him famous, Billy become insanely jealous. Then, when Billy discovers that sports stars have become even more famous than pop stars, he decides to inhabit Kleet's body and become a soccer star.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy/And the Winner Is.
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy creates a bunch of clones of himself, but one of the bands is a recipe for disaster. Then, Spencer has detention while the others go to an awards ceremony, and is determined to sneak out and join them.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: How the Test Was Won/I'm OK, You're a Kat.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop tries to study for a test but Kat keeps distracting him, and he booby-traps the whole house to make him late. Meanwhile, the boy discovers a self-help motivational tape in the House of Swap, but the feline uses it to remove his new-found positivity.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat and Millie embarrass Coop in front of the school by flipping him, so he decides to attend karate lessons to get his revenge. Coop's pranks result in the townsfolk refusing to believe a word he says.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy gets McFist thrown out of a cool resort. Then, Howard goes to the centre of the Earth to set the story straight about a lie he told.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville/Winner Takes Ball.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy accidentally sends Howard on a quest for the final Sorcerer's Ball. Then, Randy and Howard plan to buy an exotic sweet, but end up with an ancient idol, a sorcerer's ball and big trouble.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster wants to be grown up, so acquires a sushi seaweed moustache - but it's poisonous. Then, Lola is out of work so Boyster's parents decide to move to the big city.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The Kings learn their friend Oogie has to hide his relationship with Dirt Fairy chief's daughter because their tribes hate each other. They try to help, but things go wrong.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Part one of two. After meeting the ghost of Malakai, first king of Kinkow, Brady and Boomer must find his evil twin before he destroys the island, by journeying to the Dark Side.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: While visiting their grandparents, the step brothers decide to race giant hot air balloons to the top of the nearby mountain. Candace decides to give up trying to bust the boys.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys want to take Perry for a walk, but when they cannot find him, they build a giant replica instead.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys look back on their summer and think about autumn, then decide to invent a new season in between.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: In this Time Shift episode, the boys are transported to the Middle Ages. They set out to find the legendary sword Excaliferb, which they need to defeat evil sorceror Millifishmirtz.

programme.desc: The superhero travels to the mystical city of K'Un L'Un to help Iron Fist fulfil his destiny, but Iron Fist is determined to destroy them both.

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: The web-slinging hero swaps minds with the Hulk, creating chaos for everybody.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace wants to get the boys in trouble for playing jetpack volleyball, but when Jeremy joins in, she has to cover for them.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys try to solve the mystery of crop circles appearing in the area by building their own flying saucer.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys are rescued from a robot by their alien friend Meap, and return the favour by helping him save his home planet.

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: The Freemakers are in hot pursuit of the remaining Kyber Saber Crystals, but each time they find one, Naare steals it away.

programme.desc: A heavy metal extraction platform carrying toxic waste at the bottom of the ocean experiences a devastating fire. Gordon rushes in with Thunderbird 4 when the rolling factory damages its steering capabilities. With the help of Lady Penelope and Parker on the surface investigating the dealings of dubious executive Hector Ambrose, boss of the company Hydrexla, Gordon sets about rescuing platform operator Ned Tedford and his plant Gladys and prevent the rig from losing its toxic cargo.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Unknown to the Squadron Supreme and the rest of the world, the Avengers are hiding and working on a plan to save the planet and stop the Squadron Supreme once and for all.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: An alien race begs the Avengers to save them from invaders, and they discovers it is Thanos who is plundering the planet. Tony thinks it is time to seek out new challenges.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper and Mabel do not want to share a room any more, but their search for a second bedroom leads to an encounter with a carpet that has the power to switch people's bodies.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: The gang journeys into an area unchanged since prehistoric times after a pterodactyl flies off with Waddles.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder

programme.desc: Hater threatens to destroy a planet after being stood up on a date night, so Sylvia poses as his would-be sweetheart in an attempt to avert disaster.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: The Clarke household is in crisis. Will's nanobots are rapidly failing, and Nick is at a loss. Determined to save his son, Nick lays aside his initial suspicions when Katherine appears with a high-tech solution. Will comes round and, despite a nano-hangover, seems well. But, as Nick knows, he is not out of danger yet - Katherine has supplied only a temporary fix. Heeding Nick's warning, Eve tracks down Peterson with Abe in tow. At his old address, they are met by the new resident, Mr Roberts, who denies knowing the whereabouts of Mr Peterson, though Eve's suspicions are alerted when she scans a Calimov pass in the hallway. With Nick taking Will into Calimov, Eve decides it's best to be by his side, leaving Abe to investigate alone. The nano charge has had a surprising effect on Will; Lily and Eve are bemused as he relays abstract scientific theorems. As part of his ongoing therapy, Katherine administers another charge, but this time Will's body has an adverse reaction, causing him to freeze. When Mr Roberts appears, with nanotech, it becomes clear there is a deeper connection between him and Peterson. He stabilises Will, and tries to exit, but Eve is on to him. Though at first he denies he is her father, Eve has guessed the truth. Katherine confirms his identity, and claims to have brought him back with the sole purpose of saving Will. Back at Eden Farm, meanwhile, Abe discovers what Peterson has really been hiding: Rebecca, confined in his makeshift lab, supplying him with nanobots to find the cure for Will. Despite Abe's concern, she swears him to silence. But can Abe keep quiet?.

programme.sub-title: Fire Engine Hose and Reflective Strips.
programme.desc: Maddie looks at the emergency services. She uses a special camera to find out how the hose on a fire engine works and how the pump inside the fire engine creates pressure and sends water to the hose.
